item.title: 马来西亚保持关键利率不变，经济已证明可抵御关税影响
item.description: 马来西亚央行维持利率不变，因为该央行仍然相信，如果没有席卷东南亚的利率宽松政策，马来西亚经济能够经受住美国关税的考验。【原文：Malaysia kept interest rates unchanged as the central bank remained confident that the economy can weather US tariffs without the rate relief that has swept across Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行发布财报前股市和英镑走势低迷
Worldline 计划融资 5 亿欧元以求扭亏为盈
item.description: Worldline SA 正计划增资 5 亿欧元（约合 5.76 亿美元），这家陷入困境的支付公司正试图与动荡时期划清界限。【原文：Worldline SA is planning a capital increase worth €500 million ($576 million) as the embattled payments firm seeks to draw a line under a period of turmoil.】

item.title: Safaricom 上半年利润增长 52%，埃塞俄比亚亏损缩小
item.description: 肯尼亚市值最大的公司 Safaricom Plc 在埃塞俄比亚业务亏损收窄后，利润增长了 52%。【原文：Safaricom Plc, Kenya’s biggest company by market value, grew profit by 52% after narrowing losses in its Ethiopian operations.】

item.title: 比特币与黄金分道扬镳— 这对大型科技公司不利
item.description:
在长达一个月的暴跌中，或许还有一线希望。【原文：

There may be a silver lining in the month-long plunge to $100,000.

】

item.title: 阿联酋在全国 DNA 测序竞赛中获胜
item.description:
在一个国家数据库中，几乎所有公民的基因都已被测序，它是一种雄心勃勃的公共卫生方法的试验案例。【原文：

With almost all of its citizens’ genes already sequenced in a national database, it’s the test case for an ambitious—and, to some, concerning—approach to public health.

】

item.title: 捷克将维持利率不变，波兰则与降息意见分歧：决策指南
item.description: 捷克决策者准备在连续第四次会议上维持利率不变，这凸显了与邻国波兰的分歧。【原文：Czech policymakers are poised to hold interest rates for a fourth straight meeting, underscoring the divergence with neighboring Poland.】

item.title: 里夫斯认为在预算中抑制英国通胀是明智之举
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将成为最大的受益者，她将在本月的预算中努力降低英国的通货膨胀率并帮助解决生活成本问题。【原文：Rachel Reeves stands to be the biggest beneficiary of her own efforts to bring down UK inflation and help with the cost of living in this month’s budget — but only if she gets it right.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金一致看空小米
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds are ramping up bearish bets on Xiaomi Corp. as caution rises ahead of the Chinese firm’s earnings, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 日本主要工会组织寻求将工资上调 6%，日本央行关注动向
item.description: 日本最大的工会组织之一表示，在日本央行密切关注工资增长势头之际，该组织计划在明年的工资谈判中将普通工人的工资涨幅目标定为与今年相同的水平。【原文：One of Japan’s largest labor union groups said it plans to target the same level of wage gains for regular workers in next year’s pay negotiations as it did for this year, as the Bank of Japan closely scrutinizes the momentum for wage growth.】

item.title: 股价下跌，中国贵州茅台计划再次回购
item.description: 曾经是中国最大上市公司的酒类制造商贵州茅台酒股份有限公司宣布了另一项回购股票计划，此举可能会提振其低迷的股价。【原文：Liquor maker Kweichow Moutai Co., once the largest listed company in China, has announced another plan to buy back shares in a move that may lift its flagging stock price.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司与股东通过首次公开募股和配售融资 3 亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司 Grupo Aeromexico SAB 及其部分股东通过备受瞩目的首次公开募股和私募融资约 3 亿美元，在三年前退市后重返公开市场。【原文：Mexican airline Grupo Aeromexico SAB and some of its shareholders raised about $300 million through a much-anticipated IPO and private placement, returning to public markets after delisting three years ago.】

item.title: 日本贸易商准备承受中国钢铁过剩带来的更多痛苦
item.description: 随着中国钢铁出口涌入亚洲和其他地区，日本主要贸易公司正面临着铁矿石和炼焦煤价格长期低迷的局面，至少在未来六个月内利润会受到限制。【原文：Japan’s major trading houses are facing a prolonged slump in iron ore and coking coal prices as Chinese steel exports flood into Asia and beyond, constraining profits for at least the next six months.】

item.title: 阿波罗、KB Securities 携手拓展韩国私人信贷业务
item.description: 根据一份公告，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has teamed up with KB Securities Co. to explore private credit opportunities in South Korea, marking the global firm’s first partnership with a local investment bank, according to an announcement.】

item.title: 分子诊断公司 BillionToOne 首次公开募股融资 2.73 亿美元
item.description: 分子诊断公司 BillionToOne Inc.在美国政府停摆导致上市程序复杂化的情况下，在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 2.731 亿美元。【原文：BillionToOne Inc., a molecular diagnostics company, raised $273.1 million in an upsized US initial public offering, during a US government shutdown that has complicated the listing process.】

item.title: 铁矿石连续第六天下跌，创八月以来最长跌势
item.description: 随着中国钢铁行业进入淡季，以及对中美贸易休战的乐观情绪消退，铁矿石创下 8 月份以来最长的单日跌幅。【原文：Iron ore headed for its longest run of daily losses since August as China’s steel industry heads into the low season and the optimism around the US-China trade truce faded.】

item.title: 国泰君安与贝莱德、Amundi、施罗德共同关注印度共同基金的蓬勃发展
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 据说 Argo 生物制药公司将为香港 IPO 挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国生物技术公司阿尔戈生物制药有限公司（Argo Biopharmaceutical Co.【原文：Chinese biotech firm Argo Biopharmaceutical Co. has picked banks for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise a few hundred million dollars, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说软银已权衡收购 Marvell 的可能性
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）今年早些时候曾探讨收购美国芯片制造商 Marvell Technology Inc.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. explored a potential takeover of US chipmaker Marvell Technology Inc. earlier this year, people familiar with the matter said, in what would have been the semiconductor industry’s largest-ever deal.】

item.title: 进出口低于预期，越南贸易顺差缩小
item.description: 面对美国大范围的关税，越南 10 月份的出口和进口均未达到预期，贸易顺差连续第二个月收窄。【原文：Vietnam’s exports and imports both missed estimates in October, and the trade surplus narrowed for a second straight month in the face of wide-ranging US tariffs.】

item.title: 日本执政党希望每年为芯片和人工智能投入 65 亿美元
item.description: 日本执政党的目标是每年确保大约 1 万亿日元（65 亿美元），以继续支持国家的半导体和人工智能行业。【原文：Japan’s ruling party aims to secure roughly ¥1 trillion ($6.5 billion) per year to keep supporting the nation’s semiconductor and artificial intelligence sectors, according to a lawmaker who leads such efforts.】

item.title: 红杉计划在格雷迪和林毅夫领导下增加人工智能，减少党派纷争
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，红杉资本新任联席董事帕特-格雷迪（Pat Grady）和阿尔弗雷德-林（Alfred Lin）计划深化这家风投公司对人工智能领域的关注，同时努力重塑其形象，减少政治党派色彩。【原文：Sequoia Capital’s new co-stewards, Pat Grady and Alfred Lin, plan to deepen the venture capital firm’s focus on the artificial intelligence sector while working to reframe its image as less politically partisan following concerns among some partners about the leadership of Roelof Botha, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司计划在全球债务狂潮中发行日元债券
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. hired banks for a potential yen-denominated bond sale, as borrowers around the world drove issuance so far this year to a new record.】

item.title: 中国在 MSCI 的参与度近两年来首次扩大
item.description: 在摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：The number of Chinese companies in MSCI Inc.’s global stock gauges has climbed for the first time in nearly two years, setting up the market for more inflows from passive investors.】

item.title: 戴蒙认为向阿根廷提供 200 亿美元贷款的必要性降低：路透社
item.description: 路透社对摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）的采访显示，为阿根廷提供 200 亿美元的潜在私营部门融资 "可能没有必要"。【原文：Jamie Dimon said $20 billion in potential private-sector financing for Argentina “may not be necessary,” according to a Reuters interview with the JPMorgan Chase & Co. chief executive officer.】

item.title: 中国贸易休战和五年计划助力煤炭价格回升
item.description: 由于短期和长期因素共同提升了人们对需求前景的信心，中国动力煤价格已攀升至今年以来的最高水平。【原文：China’s thermal coal price has climbed to its highest level this year, as a combination of short and long-term factors lift confidence in the outlook for demand.】

item.title: Pony 和 WeRide 在机器人出租车上市对决后，在香港首次亮相时下跌
item.description: Pony AI 公司和 WeRide 公司在香港上市首日下跌，此前这两家中国机器人出租车公司为公开募股争夺投资者，募集资金超过 11 亿美元。【原文：Pony AI Inc. and WeRide Inc. fell on their trading debuts in Hong Kong after the pair of Chinese robotaxi firms battled for investors for their public offerings, which raised more than $1.1 billion.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官认为尽管有人工智能，员工数量仍将保持稳定："总是要重新部署
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在其他雇主的裁员浪潮中表示，如果 "我们做得好"，这家美国最大银行的员工人数可能会保持稳定或上升，因为它将继续推出人工智能。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon — weighing in amid a wave of job cuts at other employers — said headcount at the largest US bank will probably remain steady or rise as it continues to roll out artificial intelligence, if “we do a good job.”】

item.title: EQT 支持的生物技术公司 Evommune 首次公开募股融资 1.5 亿美元
item.description: Evommune Inc.是一家针对慢性炎症性疾病的生物技术公司，该公司在首次公开募股中募集到了1.5亿美元，成为在美国政府停摆的情况下仍能继续上市的公司中的一员。【原文：Evommune Inc., a biotechnology company targeting chronic inflammatory diseases, raised $150 million in an initial public offering, adding to the list of companies that have been able to proceed with listings despite the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 耐克斯佩里亚称因中国供应商拒付货款而停止供货
item.description: Nexperia 表示，由于中国工厂拒绝付款，该公司暂停了对中国工厂的供货，这暴露了这家陷入困境的汽车芯片制造商的内部不和。【原文：Nexperia said it suspended supplies to its China factory because the local unit refused to make payments, laying bare the internal discord at the embattled automotive chipmaker.】
